    Privacy Policy

    Last updated: July 25, 2025

    1. Information We Collect

    This website uses Google Analytics to collect information about how visitors use our site, including:

    • Usage Data: Pages visited, time spent, navigation patterns
    • Device Information: Browser type, operating system, screen resolution
    • Location Data: General geographic location (city/country level)
    • Referral Information: How you arrived at our site

    2. How We Use This Information

    We use the collected data to:

    • Understand which documentation is most helpful
    • Improve our content and site performance
    • Analyze usage patterns to enhance user experience

    3. Data Sharing

    Your data is processed by Google Analytics according to Google's Privacy Policy. We do not sell, trade, or share your personal information with third parties except as described in this policy.

    4. Cookies and Tracking

    This site uses cookies through Google Analytics to:

    • Distinguish unique visitors
    • Remember your preferences
    • Analyze site traffic patterns

    5. Your Rights (GDPR/CCPA)

    You have the right to:

    • Access: Request information about data we collect
    • Deletion: Request deletion of your data
    • Opt-out: Disable tracking (see below)
    • Portability: Request data in a portable format

    6. How to Opt-Out

    You can opt out of Google Analytics tracking by:

    • Installing the Google Analytics Opt-out Browser Add-on
    • Disabling cookies in your browser settings
    • Using browser privacy/incognito mode

    7. Data Retention

    Google Analytics data is automatically deleted after 26 months. For more information, see Google's data retention policies.

    8. Children's Privacy

    This site is not directed at children under 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13.

    9. International Users

    This site is operated from the United States. If you are visiting from outside the US, your data may be transferred to and processed in the US.

    10. Changes to This Policy

    We may update this privacy policy from time to time. Changes will be posted on this page with an updated "Last updated" date.

    11. Contact Us

    For questions about this privacy policy or to exercise your rights, please contact us:

    • GitHub: Open an issue
    • Forums: Meta Creator Forums

    12. Google Analytics Information

    For detailed information about how Google Analytics works and processes data, please review:

    • Google Privacy Policy
    • How Google Analytics works
    • How Google uses data from sites that use their services
